compatibility.notes: The Artistic License is incompatible with GPL due to differences in copyleft provisions. When distributing proprietary software that uses AML-covered code, you must provide the source code or an offer to provide it.

key_requirements: Must not use Apple's name, trademarks, service marks or logos to endorse or promote products derived from the Apple Software without specific prior written permission from Apple.
Must not assert patent rights that may be infringed by derivative works or by other works in which the Apple Software may be incorporated.
license.name: AML
obligations: Retain the notice and disclaimers in all redistributions of the Apple Software.
